text: F1 is an upcoming American sports action drama movie. It is expected to be released on June 25, 2025 in Worldwide and on June 27, 2025 in the United States and Canada. It was directed by Joseph Kosinski and stars Brad Pitt, Damson Idris, Kerry Condon, Tobias Menzies, Kim Bodnia, and Javier Bardem. It was made with help from Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile (FIA). The movie follows Sonny Hayes, an-ex Formula 1 driver who suffers an accident while racing and attempts to get back into racing. Principal photography for the movie started in Silverstone, United Kingdom on July 8, 2023 and ended on December 8, 2024 in Abu Dhabi. it is likely that the film will receive a PG-13 rating in the United States. == Cast == ===Real life drivers=== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s sports movies Category:2020s action movies Category:2020s drama movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph Kosinski Category:Formula One Category:Upcoming movies Category:IMAX movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: F1 (movie)
